com.googlecode.javacpp

Class Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.javacpp.Builder

  • public class Builder
extends Object
    The Builder is responsible for coordinating efforts between the Generator and the native compiler. It contains the main() method, and basically takes care of the tasks one would expect from a command line build tool, but can also be used programmatically by setting its properties and calling build().
    Author:
    Samuel Audet

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Builder.ClassScanner
      Given a Builder.UserClassLoader, attempts to match and fill in a Collection of Class, in various ways in which users may wish to do so.
      static class  Builder.Piper
      A simple Thread that reads data as fast as possible from an InputStream and writes to the OutputStream.
      static class  Builder.UserClassLoader
      An extension of URLClassLoader that keeps a list of paths in memory.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Builder.ClassScanner classScanner
      The instance of the Builder.ClassScanner that fills up a Collection of Class objects to process.
      (package private) boolean compile
      If true, compiles the generated source file to a shared library and deletes source.
      (package private) Collection<String> compilerOptions
      Contains additional command line options from the user for the native compiler.
      (package private) boolean copyLibs
      If true, also copies to the output directory dependent shared libraries (link and preload).
      (package private) Map<String,String> environmentVariables
      User specified environment variables to pass to the native compiler.
      (package private) boolean header
      If true, also generates C++ header files containing declarations of callback functions.
      (package private) String jarPrefix
      The name of the JAR file to create, if not null.
      (package private) File outputDirectory
      The directory where the generated files and compiled shared libraries get written to.
      (package private) String outputName
      The name of the output generated source file or shared library.
      (package private) Properties properties
      Accumulates the various properties loaded from resources, files, command line options, etc.

    • Field Detail

      • outputDirectory

        File outputDirectory
        The directory where the generated files and compiled shared libraries get written to. By default they are placed in the same directory as the .class file.

      • outputName

        String outputName
        The name of the output generated source file or shared library. This enables single- file output mode. By default, the top-level enclosing classes get one file each.

      • jarPrefix

        String jarPrefix
        The name of the JAR file to create, if not null.

      • compile

        boolean compile
        If true, compiles the generated source file to a shared library and deletes source.

      • header

        boolean header
        If true, also generates C++ header files containing declarations of callback functions.

      • copyLibs

        boolean copyLibs
        If true, also copies to the output directory dependent shared libraries (link and preload).

      • properties

        Properties properties
        Accumulates the various properties loaded from resources, files, command line options, etc.

      • classScanner

        Builder.ClassScanner classScanner
        The instance of the Builder.ClassScanner that fills up a Collection of Class objects to process.

      • environmentVariables

        Map<String,String> environmentVariables
        User specified environment variables to pass to the native compiler.

      • compilerOptions

        Collection<String> compilerOptions
        Contains additional command line options from the user for the native compiler.

        Default constructor that simply initializes everything.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public File parse(Class cls)
           throws IOException,
                  Parser.Exception
        Calls Parser.parse(File, Class) after creating an instance of the Class and running Parser.InfoMapper.map(Parser.InfoMap).
        Parameters:
        cls - The class annotated with Properties and implementing Parser.InfoMapper
        Returns:
        the target File produced
        Throws:
        IOException - on Java target file writing error
        Parser.Exception - on C/C++ header file parsing error

      • includeJavaPaths

        public static void includeJavaPaths(Loader.ClassProperties properties,
                    boolean header)
        Tries to find automatically include paths for jni.h and jni_md.h, as well as the link and library paths for the jvm library.
        Parameters:
        properties - the Properties containing the paths to update
        header - to request support for exporting callbacks via generated header file

      • compile

        public int compile(String sourceFilename,
          String outputFilename,
          Loader.ClassProperties properties)
            throws IOException,
                   InterruptedException
        Launches and waits for the native compiler to produce a native shared library.
        Parameters:
        sourceFilename - the C++ source filename
        outputFilename - the output filename of the shared library
        properties - the Properties detailing the compiler options to use
        Returns:
        the result of Process.waitFor()
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • generateAndCompile

        public File generateAndCompile(Class[] classes,
                      String outputName)
                        throws IOException,
                               InterruptedException
        Generates a C++ source file for classes, and compiles everything in one shared library when compile == true.
        Parameters:
        classes - the Class objects as input to Generator
        outputName - the output name of the shared library
        Returns:
        the actual File generated, either the compiled library or its source
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • createJar

        public static void createJar(File jarFile,
             String[] classpath,
             File... files)
                      throws IOException
        Stores all the files in the given JAR file. Also attempts to root the paths of the filenames to each element of a list of classpaths.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the JAR file to create
        classpath - an array of classpaths to try to use as root
        files - a list of files to store in the JAR file
        Throws:
        IOException
